newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: S.African July gold/forex reserves 22.8 bln rand.
newsitem.headline: S.African July gold/forex reserves 22.8 bln rand.

text.p: South Africa's combined gold and foreign exchange reserves rose 670 million rand to 22.8 billion rand in July from June's 22.13 billion rand, Reserve Bank figures show.
The central bank gave only headline figures. A full breakdown will be published next week.
The bank also said the use of foreign credit lines at the end of July amounted to 3.2 billion rand.
It also said that private individuals had transferred out of South Africa or placed in foreign currency accounts 144 million rand since the July 1 lifting of foreign exchange controls.
Economists predicted at the end of last week that reserves would amount to between 21.5 billion to 23.3 billion rand.
